page.description: Advanced settings for configuring the Application Server.

item.name: Systray Caption
item.description: The text to display in the Systray caption for the server.

item.name: Maximum URI Length (bytes)
item.description: The maximum length of a URI that the server can receive in bytes.

item.name: IP Address Binding
item.description: The maximum allowed requests per Keep-Alive connection before using a new connection.

item.name: MIME Types File
item.description: The location of the MIME types file. The default name of the MIME types file is *[ui:MIMETypes.xml]*. MIME types can be extended by adding them to the MIME types file.

item.name: License Lease
item.description: Settings for configuring the length of the license lease.

item.name: Lease Lifetime
item.description: Specify the lifetime of the license lease in minutes. Default value is 15.

item.name: Temporary Files
item.description: Configure how the server handles temporary file clean-up.

item.name: Remove files older than
item.description: Temporary files older than the specified number of minutes will be removed. Default value is 15.

item.name: Read Timeouts
item.description: Defines the maximum amount of time to wait for a response for a request header or request body.

item.name: Request Headers
item.description: Specify the read timeout for request headers in seconds. Default value is 30.

item.name: Request Body
item.description: Specify the read timeout for the request body in seconds. Default value is 60.

item.name: Build-In Resources
item.description: Control whether or not built-in resources are used.

item.name: AJAX URL Processing
item.description: Enable or disable Ajax URL processing.

item.name: Internal Image Library
item.description: Enable or disable the use of the internal Alpha Anywhere image library.

item.name: Alpha Software Favicon
item.description: If checked, the Alpha Software favicon will be used in web applications.

item.name: Alpha JavaScript Library
item.description: Enable or disable the use of the Alpha Anywhere JavaScript Library.

item.name: Sessions
item.description: Options for controlling how the Application Server handles sessions.

item.name: Cookie Name
item.description: Default value is 'A5WSessionId'.

item.name: Lifetime in minutes
item.description: The length of a session, specified in minutes. If a session is inactive for longer than the specified time, it expires. Default value is 15.

description.p: The *[ui:Same Site Mode]* specifies how cookies are served from the Application Server for cross-origin requests.

item.name: Unset
item.description: The SameSite attribute is not set and is not sent with requests.

item.name: None
item.description: The SameSite attribute is set to "None". Cookies are sent in all contexts, including cross-origin. A SameSite policy of "None" requires [SSL].

item.name: Lax
item.description: The SameSite attribute is set to "Lax". Cookies are allowed to be sent in top-level navigation and in GET requests to third-party websites.

item.name: Strict
item.description: The SameSite attribute is set to "Strict". Cookies are only sent in first-party context. Cookies are not sent to third-party websites.

description.p: To learn more about Same Site cookies and solutions for common warnings, see *[extlink:SameSite Cookies (MDN)@https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite]*

important.p: You must set the Same Site policy to *[Unset]* or *[None]* if you are deploying PhoneGap Applications that must communicate with the Application Server.

item.name: Transfer Maximums
item.description: Specify limitations for file upload (POST) and downloads.

item.name: Maximum file download size (MB)
item.description: The maximum file size allowed for download in MB. Default is 512.

item.name: Maximum POST body size (MB)
item.description: The maximum size permitted for a POST body in MB. Default is 32.

item.name: Automatic Log Rotation
item.description: Configure the application server to rotate log files daily or when the log file grows to a maximum size.

item.name: Rotate Daily
item.description: When enabled, log files will be rotated daily.

item.name: Rotate By Size
item.description: Rotate log files when a specified file size limit is reached.

item.name: Log File Size Limit (KB)
item.description: Defines the maximum size of a log file for the *[ui:Rotate By Size]* behavior.

item.name: Advanced Logging
item.description: Advanced logging options for tracing socket data and thread transitions.

item.name: Trace Socket Data
item.description: Enables logging of socket data. Socket logging should be turned off in a production environment.

item.name: Log Thread Transitions
item.description: Enables logging of Xbasic thread transitions. Thread logging should be turned off unless explicitly requested by Alpha Software for use in debugging.
